    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final record 
    ForgeBiomeModifiers.AddFeaturesBiomeModifier
    Stock biome modifier that adds features to biomes.
    static final record 
    ForgeBiomeModifiers.AddSpawnsBiomeModifier
    Stock biome modifier that adds a mob spawn to a biome.
    static final record 
    ForgeBiomeModifiers.RemoveFeaturesBiomeModifier
    Stock biome modifier that removes features from biomes.
    static final record 
    ForgeBiomeModifiers.RemoveSpawnsBiomeModifier
    Stock biome modifier that removes mob spawns from a biome.
    class 
    NoneBiomeModifier
    Noop biome modifier.

    Codec for (de)serializing biome modifiers inline.

    BiomeModifier.REFERENCE_CODEC
    Codec for referring to biome modifiers by id in other datapack registry files.
